alert.note: Alert for Davidson; Montgomery; Stanly (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 6:14PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Davidson, northwestern Montgomery and northeastern Stanly Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 614 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Badin Lake to 6 miles north of Plyler to near Rockwell. Movement was southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Albemarle, Badin Lake, Plyler, Badin, Richfield, New London, Eldorado, Fish Tales Marina, Finger and Whip-O-Will Campground. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
